# SCVideoStreamAnalyzer.StreamDirection

**Enumeration**

Options for the different types of analyzed video streams.

## Declaration

```swift
enum StreamDirection
```

## Overview

Pass this enum into the [doc://com.apple.SensitiveContentAnalysis/documentation/SensitiveContentAnalysis/SCVideoStreamAnalyzer/init(participantUUID:streamDirection:)] initializer when creating an [doc://com.apple.SensitiveContentAnalysis/documentation/SensitiveContentAnalysis/SCVideoStreamAnalyzer] to analyze video streams.

## Identifying a stream direction

- **SCVideoStreamAnalyzer.StreamDirection.incoming**: An option that refers to a video stream from another device.
- **SCVideoStreamAnalyzer.StreamDirection.outgoing**: An option that refers to a video stream sent to another device.

## Initializing a stream direction

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a stream direction with the given raw value.

## Creating a video stream analyzer

- **init(participantUUID:streamDirection:)**: Creates a video stream analyzer for the given call participant and stream option.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
